name: @status-machina/knexjs-pg-pattern
description: Event sourcing pattern for PostgreSQL in KnexJS

scripts.test: npm run build && npm run test:setup && vitest --run; EXIT_CODE=$?; npm run test:teardown; exit $EXIT_CODE
scripts.test:watch: npm run build && npm run test:setup && vitest; npm run test:teardown
scripts.test:setup: docker compose up -d && npm run wait-for-db && npm run migrate
